channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Hyperion Data Relationship Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Hyperion Data Relationship Management

item.title: CVE-2018-2915|2024-08-05T04:36:38.557Z -- oracle%20corporation -- hyperion%20data%20relationship%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Hyperion Data Relationship Management component of Oracle Hyperion (subcomponent: Access and security). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.4.330. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTPS to compromise Hyperion Data Relationship Management. While the vulnerability is in Hyperion Data Relationship Management, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Hyperion Data Relationship Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.8 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2018-3208|2024-08-05T04:43:35.308Z -- oracle%20corporation -- hyperion%20data%20relationship%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Hyperion Data Relationship Management component of Oracle Hyperion (subcomponent: Access and Security). The supported version that is affected is 11.1.2.4.345. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Hyperion Data Relationship Management. While the vulnerability is in Hyperion Data Relationship Management, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Hyperion Data Relationship Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.7 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:N/A:N).

Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Hyperion Data Relationship Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Hyperion Data Relationship Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
